## Name 

| Servings | Time | Source |
|:---|:---|:-------------------|
| 1 serving  | 30 min | N/A | 


### Ingredients:

- Seeds from fresh squash (delicata or sphagetti squash)
- Salt (or seasoned salt)
- Olive oil 


### Directions 

- Set oven at 325 degrees 
- Separate seeds from guts of squash and put seeds into a bowl
- Add a small amount of olive oil; mix until seeds are lightly coated
- Add salt and mix until seeds are lightly coated
- Spread seeds out on a baking sheet (with parchment paper)
- Bake for 15-25 min (or until seeds are golden brown)
